subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stretch]]; to [[draw]] [[firmly]]; to [[strap]]
# to [[brace]]; to [[taut]]
# {{lb|zh|of an [[object]]}} to [[spring up]]; to [[bounce]]
# to [[strain]] one's [[muscles]]
# to [[pull]] one's face
# to [[split]]
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[very]]; [[terribly]]
